name: A Gig
description:
You are a detective, and your job is to find out what happened at the crime scene. Find clues, make connections and come up with different theories until you solve the crime. And remember - there are many ways to solve a crime.

Developers' note:  we had version control + deadline issues, and that's why the main menu (along with the story intro) and the exit buttons are implemented, but on a separate build, and thus are absent here. We will publish the update in a little bit outside of Jam's submissions. For now use alt+f4 :)
